item.title: Organize Your Work With tmux Sessions
item.description: At any given time I have several projects on the go, and each one gets its own tmux session. This makes it easy to keep my work organized and I can quickly switch to another project without having to close any programs. When I’m ready to resume work on a project I attach to its tmux session and vim and any other terminals or programs I’ve opened are exactly as I left them.
